name: ygr-styleguide
description: Styleguide of Your Game Race, a competition platform for online games.
author: Sebastian Barthel

scripts.watch: concurrently --kill-others "webpack --watch" "cpx dist/*.css docs/assets/styles/ --watch" "cpx dist/icons/*.svg docs/assets/icons/ --watch" "cpx dist/assets/backgrounds/*.png docs/assets/backgrounds/ --watch" "cpx dist/assets/elements/*.png docs/assets/elements/ --watch" "cpx 'dist/assets/fonts/*.{svg,eot,ttf}' 'docs/assets/fonts/' --watch"
